draw.overall_supervision_plan: The OIC, RSO, and range leadership will conduct a range safety briefing prior to all training.  While the OIC and RSO hold overall responsibility for safety, safeties and instructors are expected to actively monitor range activities and soldier actions to mitigate risks at the lowest level and ensure the overall safety of the training event.  Safety briefings and inspections will address all identified risks to ensure they are appropriately mitigated.  Additionally, at least on vehicle and medic will be present on site to respond to any serious injuries, should they occur.
